name: MikroTik MAC Discovery
description: Discover devices via RouterOS /tool/ip/scan and tag vendor using local OUI ranges.
author: System

inputs.name: router_ip
inputs.label: Router IP
inputs.description: Reachable IP of the MikroTik RouterOS device.

inputs.name: interface
inputs.label: Interface (optional)
inputs.description: Leave blank to scan all interfaces.

inputs.name: scan_duration_s
inputs.label: Scan Duration (seconds)
inputs.description: How long to let /tool/ip/scan run before collecting results.

inputs.name: replace_on_ip
inputs.label: Replace on IP Match
inputs.description: If an IP already exists with a different MAC, replace that device with the new MAC/vendor.

inputs.name: trace_output
inputs.label: Trace Output
inputs.description: Print raw RouterOS scan output to the server console.
